name: Mother Earth (TripleSeven, siccity)
description:
Humankind has lain waste to Earth. The Council has been unable to stop them from spreading across the planet, destroying forests, polluting oceans, and generally being a nuisance.

Now, the Council looks to you for help in quelling this threat. After all, no one knows death better than you...

Controls:

Use the arrow keys and spacebar to select cards. M to toggle background music.
